description:
* Based on http://anidb.net/cr49347 [Gamu]`s comedy web manga series.
http://anidb.net/ch105908 [Lion], http://anidb.net/ch105907 [Lizard], and http://anidb.net/ch105905 [Toucan] live the lives of office workers in a capitalist society in Japan, while also dealing with their unique situations as animals living beyond the savanna and the food chain.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Rowdy Toucan tries public transport. Lizard spies a special treat at a donut shop. Lion terrifies the junior employees. Toucan`s mixer goes sideways.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
Lion starts a diet. The coworkers discuss repurposing lightly used bathwater. Toucan has relationship issues. The CEO announces a rare cryptid search.

Lizard wants to learn a party trick to impress clients. Toucan is sent to reserve the company`s flower-viewing spot. Lion and Lizard mourn a coworker.

The company holds its 36th meeting on cost reduction with Big Cat, Lizard and other members of the board. Toucan, however, gets into an unfortunate accident.

REGULAR.description:
Toucan is tasked with taking work to Granny. Toucan is excited for summer vacation, but Lizard has some bad news. A nasty coworker is pulling pranks in the office and Toucan decides to take justice into his own hands.
Source: crunchyroll
